content: Hi All, I've prepared dispositions for almosts all of the 127 comments we received on the ballot. Thanks to the community for a thorough review with a lot of great comments. There are several marked Discuss at WGM that I think might be appropriate for discussion, please take a look and let me know. I've also used the Fit for Teleconference category for in person resolution where I'm not sure whether the commenter is here this week.

Hi All, I've prepared dispositions for almosts all of the 127 comments we received on the ballot. Thanks to the community for a thorough review with a lot of great comments. There are several marked Discuss at WGM that I think might be appropriate for discussion, please take a look and let me know. I've also used the Fit for Teleconference category for in person resolution where I'm not sure whether the commenter is here this week.

Where can I find the dispostions?
In gforge, filter the ballot to 2019 May FHIRPath

@Bryn Rhodes
I went to the resolutions. I agree with most of the resolutions.
The ones that I disagree with, are mostly labeled as to be discussed in the WGM or telco. There are some exceptions:
#21549, #21557, #21558, #21586 and #21606

Can you take the following tickets out of the block vote, indicate InPerson:yes and Group:fit for teleconference ?
@Bas van den Heuvel , sure thing, I removed those comments from the block vote and will look for a time to continue resolution. For a few of them I also proposed an followup disposition.
